original_text: Their wings touched each other. All the living things moved forward together. They did not turn as they moved.
korean_text: 날개는 다 서로 연하였으며 갈 때에는 돌이키지 아니하고 일제히 앞으로 곧게 행하며

sentences.original_text: All the living things moved forward together
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 살아있는 것들이 함께 앞으로 나아갔다

sentences.original_text: They did not turn as they moved
